extensionDescription.message: Check your email with Gemini AI before sending

apiConfigurationDescription.message: To use this add-on, you need a Gemini API key. Get one for free at

googleAIStudio.description: Link text for Google AI Studio

aboutDescription1.message: This add-on uses Google's Gemini AI to review your emails before sending. It checks for spelling, grammar, tone, clarity, and potential issues.

aboutDescription2.message: Your emails are sent to Google's Gemini API for analysis. Please review Google's privacy policy before using this add-on.

errorApiKeyRequired.description: Error message when API key is missing

errorEndpointRequired.description: Error message when API endpoint is missing

successSaved.description: Success message when settings are saved

errorApiKeyTooShort.message: API key appears to be too short. Please check your key.
errorApiKeyTooShort.description: Error message when API key is too short

errorTestApiKeyFirst.message: Please enter an API key first
errorTestApiKeyFirst.description: Error message when testing without API key

errorTestEndpointFirst.message: Please enter an API endpoint first
errorTestEndpointFirst.description: Error message when testing without endpoint

successTestConnection.message: ‚úì Connection successful! API key is valid.
successTestConnection.description: Success message when connection test passes

errorTestUnexpectedResponse.message: Connection succeeded but received unexpected response
errorTestUnexpectedResponse.description: Error message when test succeeds but response is unexpected

errorTestConnectionFailed.description: Error message when connection test fails

sendAnywayButton.description: Button text to send email anyway

configureApiKeyLink.message: Configure API Key and Custom Prompt

errorConfigureApiKey.message: Please configure your Gemini API key in the settings.
errorConfigureApiKey.description: Error message when API key is not configured

errorComposeWindow.description: Error message when compose window is not found

customPromptPlaceholder.message: Optional: Enter additional instructions for Gemini AI (will be added to the beginning of each request)

customPromptDescription.message: You can add custom instructions that will be prepended to every email review request. This allows you to customize how Gemini analyzes your emails.

cachedResponse.description: Indicator showing that the response is from cache

contentChangedCachedResponse.message: ‚ö†Ô∏è Email content has changed. Showing previous analysis.
contentChangedCachedResponse.description: Indicator showing that email content changed but displaying old cached response

reRequestButton.description: Button text to re-request analysis from Gemini
